answerText: Tennessee Williams[10] Reverend Shannon travels with an entourage of women to a hotel managed by Maxine Faulk in this Williams play.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 14 | 15 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This author adapted Anton Chekhov's The Seagull into his play The Notebook of Trigorin. For 10 points each: [10] Name this playwright who wrote the essay "The Catastrophe of Success" after the popularity of his play The Glass Menagerie.
